summary: Add a Snow Saber cat, named "Snowmoon", as a follower.
descriptionHtml:
You can find him on "Silverdrift Lair". U just need teleport, so you'll see the little cat wating for you!
The cats level is the same of you and he is "Essential" (doesn't die).

ps: the vanilla level of a Saber cat is 11.


Credits to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4672007]Darkfox127[/url]﻿  tutorials
author: LordLua
